de.frauas.jdemandmodel.simulator

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.frauas.jdemandmodel.simulator.Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class puts it all together. It needs occupancy values and a list of appliances as input and from that simulates lighting (using the provided bulb configuration), demand for all specified appliances and the total demand and the result is written to one compact matrix.
    Author:
    lukas

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulator

        public Simulator(int[] occupancyValues,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Appliance> appList)
        Creates a new Simulator, that will use the given occupancy values and appliances for simulation.
        Parameters:
        occupancyValues - occupancy values to be used (see OccupancyModeler)
        appList - list of appliances to be used (see ApplianceManager)

    • Method Detail

      • runDemandModelSimulation

        public Matrix runDemandModelSimulation(int bulbConfig)
        This method simulates the lighting demand and demand of all appliances from the occupancy values and data each appliance hold. It also calculates the total demand.
        Parameters:
        bulbConfig - the bulb configuration to be used for the simulation (see file "input/lighting/bulbs.csv")
        Returns:
        a matrix holding occupancy, total demand, lighting demand and demand of all appliances passed to the constructor for 1440 1-minute time intervals.
        See Also:
        Lighting}, Appliance} "hasNextTimeInterval" and "nextWattage"
